name: Voxel Dreams: The Philosopher's Bistrot #07: Risoto de Disco, by DJ The Chef
description:
From peddlers, traveling salesman, truckers and nomadic troops, ´Risoto de Disco´ is a delicacy prepared with various ingredients in the plow disc (truck rim). Childhood memories of the author bring colors and confortfood flavours on this voxel dish. DJ The Chef (a.k.a. wasem_simon) teaches a tasty recipe that yields many servings.


Risoto de Disco - The Brazilian Disco Risotto - vegetarian version
4 farms of rice
1 kg of cassava
1 red pepper (seedless)
1 large onion
2 garlic cloves
4 ripe tomatoes (seedless)
green seasoning to taste (parsley, chives, mangerone)

If you want to collect the cryptovoxels wearable, please visit our store at: https://opensea.io/CryptoVoxels_Wearables
